alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 3:36AM EST until December 11 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches for a storm total of 3 to 9 inches. * WHERE...Portions of northern New York and central, northwest and southern Vermont. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult, especially during the morning commute. Isolated to scattered power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates this morning will approach 1 inch per hour at times. Furthermore, gusty northwest winds 25 to 35 mph could produce additional power outages this afternoon into tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
